title: Weather Cast
description: A web application that provides real-time weather updates using APIs, showcasing current conditions, forecasts, and more.

title: Share Market
description: An application to track stock market trends, live updates, and performance analytics for smarter investment decisions.

title: TravelEase Stays
description: A smart home booking platform designed for travelers, offering seamless and tech-savvy accommodation experiences.

title: Open Library
description: A project integrating the Open Library API to provide users access to a vast collection of books and authors.

title: Enjoy Delicious Food
description: A project designed to provide users with access to a wide variety of restaurant menus, reviews, and online reservation features.
